text: Nancy Kelly (March 25, 1921 â€“ January 2, 1995) was an American actress. She was a leading movie lady in the 1930s. She made movies between 1926 and 1977. In The Bad Seed, she played Christine. In Show Business (1944), she played Nancy Gae. Kelly was born in Lowell, Massachusetts. She died from diabetes in Bel-Air, California at age seventy-three. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Disease-related deaths in Los Angeles Category:1921 births Category:1995 deaths Category:People from Lowell, Massachusetts
title: Nancy Kelly
